explains: adj. 香胶或香脂的；如香油的；有镇静作用的

sentences.en: Serve with red onion, sliced grapefruit and balsamic vinegar.
sentences.cn: 之后配上红洋葱、切好的西柚和香脂醋食用。

sentences.en: Balsamic vinegar is aged until it becomes dark and mellow, with a sweet-sour flavor.
sentences.cn: 陈酿的香醋至颜色黑暗，味道醇厚酸甜。

sentences.en: My 5- year-old son -- a very picky eater!-- now loves romaine lettuce with balsamic dressing, a major step.
sentences.cn: 我那5岁大的儿子是个美食家，但他现在喜欢用香料调味的莴苣，这是过渡到素食的重要一步。
